price: 75. Ekokutolama te mpe bakozanga elikia o kati na yango.
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
